speaker: Alicia Edelman Pelton
title: New Features In Language Understanding | AI Show
description:
LUIS enables developers to quickly create enterprise-ready, conversational applications that communicate with a user in natural language. We’ll introduce you to the improvements in the LUIS portal and the new features that enable you to build more sophisticated models than ever before.
